```{r}
library("datasets")
```

```{r}
work_with_dataset <- function(data, rows, columns, operation) {
  calculation_v <- c()
  subsetting    <- data.frame(data[rows, columns])
  for (i in seq_along(columns)) {
    if (is.numeric(subsetting[,i])) {
      calculation_v[i] <- operation(subsetting[,i])
    } else {
      calculation_v    <- table(subsetting[,i])
    }
  }
  return(list(calculation_v))
}
```

```{r}
data = Orange
work_with_dataset(data, c(1,2,3), c('age'), mean)
```
```{r}
data = mtcars
work_with_dataset(data, c(1,2,3),c('mpg'),sd)
```
```{r}
work_with_dataset_2 <- function(data, rows, columns, operation) {
  subsetting    <- data.frame(data[rows, columns])
  num_operation <- function(x, operation) {
    if (is.numeric(x)) {
      return(operation(x))
    } else {
      return(table(x))
      
    }
  }
  calculate <- sapply(subsetting, num_operation, operation)
  return(list(subsetting, calculate))
}
```
